prompts: Design a majestic bird Pokemon with fiery wings and a golden beak that soars above the clouds.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of fire, with vibrant colors and a fierce expression.
Generate an elegant flying creature that represents the sun, featuring bright orange and yellow feathers.
Make a legendary bird Pokemon with a powerful presence, adorned with flames and a graceful wingspan.
Imagine a mythical avian Pokemon that brings warmth to the cold, with a striking color palette and radiant features.
Create a fire-type Pokemon with a stunning plumage, showcasing a blend of warm colors and an intimidating stance.
